useCase.name: Learn Github
useCase.description: Employee learns how to use Github for issue tracking and repository management.

preconditions.precondition: Employee has identified the need for Github training.

successEndConditions.condition: Employee has successfully participated in assigned Github issues.

mainSequence.step: Employee identifies the need for Github training.
Resource provides access to Github Documentation and Tutorials.
Employee explores Github functionalities through guided tutorials.
Github demonstrates issue tracking and repository management.
Employee navigates to assigned issues in the Issue Tracker.
Issue Tracker queries for issues tagged to Employee.
Github returns a list of assigned issues to the Issue Tracker.
Issue Tracker displays assigned issues to Employee.
Employee participates in issues by commenting and updating status.
